SEARCH
Package mru.tsc.model

Class BoardGame

java.lang.Object
mru.tsc.model.Toy
mru.tsc.model.BoardGame
public class BoardGame extends Toy
The class represents a board game toy in the Toy Store system. It extends the class and adds extra details such as the number of players and the game's designer(s). This class helps organize and store information about different board games, making it easy to manage their data and display it in a readable format.
Since:
2025-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alexander Yoseph, Lorenzo Sta Maria, Haseeb Ullah

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardGame

      public BoardGame(String serialNum, String name, String brand, double price, int count, int age, int minPlayers, int maxPlayers, String designers)
      Creates a new object with all its details filled in. It uses the superclass constructor to set the shared toy information.
      Parameters:
      serialNum - the serial number of the board game
      name - the name of the board game
      brand - the brand of the board game
      price - the price of the board game
      count - how many copies are available in stock
      age - the recommended minimum age for players
      minPlayers - the smallest number of players needed to play
      maxPlayers - the largest number of players allowed
      designers - the name(s) of the game designer(s), separated by commas if multiple
